column52: commentable_entity.description

column2: Bias in any field is dangerous. For a psychologist it is highly unprofessional!
column52:
First, as an "expert" witness, Dr. Dawn Hughes has shown nothing but clear biases towards men being abusers, and that women are always the victims. In multiple scenarios, she would only describe DV using gender roles such as that. This is very unprofessional, and if I were a male, I would absolutely stay clear of her practice. 

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life. 

If you are a psychiatrist or a former client, or someone she testified against, I encourage you to sign this. I also encourage you reporting her as well. I believe between a lot of signatures and mass reporting her, through credible sources, we can make this happen.

column2:
Signing this petition because her bias was appalling; and the fact that Dr. Hughes admitted (claimed?) that her approach with Amber Heard was her "standard methodology that [she] would use with any individual ... [that she] was called to evaluate" is so despicable. 
Whether that portion of her testimony's true, or she did it for the money (or the good publicity she thought she'd get?), it doesn't matter — the fact that Dr. Hughes' "board certified" is outrageous, and should definitely be re-examined. 
Nevermind the fact that, given her willingness to go so far outside the bounds of what's ethical, she should also *never* be hired to do seminars teaching other doctors  (and lawyers) anything.

column2:
In her testimony, Dawn Hughes exhibited bias so extreme one has to wonder how exactly she ever attained licensure, let alone the prominence in her field that she has. She downright refused to admit that women can be IPV perpetrators. According to her, for a male to be a victim of IPV it could only be at the hands of a same-sex partner. I know firsthand that females can be perpetrators; as well as the cruelty and crushing anxiety and fear that a borderline brings it into one's existence.
In her testimony Dr Hughes stated that part of her practice involves assisting women who have killed their partners; admirable in cases of true self defense in the face of extreme ipv. But given Dr Hughes' clear, overwhelming bias, I am left to wonder how many men were simply murdered by their partners only to have their Killers walk free, aided and abetted by the "expert" testimony of Dawn Hughes.

column2:
Dr Hughes showed a very strong bias against male DV victims while showing very cleary for all female DV victims by continuously stating “she” and “her” when describing female victims and not mentioning male victims at all until specific questions were asked of her regarding male DV victims. 
In showing such strenuous bias she has shown herself as being very untrustworthy as a Dr. of Psychology. In my opinion this very biased “Doctor” should not be allowed to practice and definitely should lose her board certification at the very least but i feel she should lose her license to practice completely and all her past cases should be looked over with a fine tooth comb
column52:
First, as an "expert" witness, Dr. Dawn Hughes has shown nothing but clear biases towards men being abusers, and that women are always the victims. In multiple scenarios, she would only describe DV using gender roles such as that. This is very unprofessional, and if I were a male, I would absolutely stay clear of her practice. 

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life. 

If you are a psychiatrist or a former client, or someone she testified against, I encourage you to sign this. I also encourage you reporting her as well. I believe between a lot of signatures and mass reporting her, through credible sources, we can make this happen.

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life.

In multiple scenarios, she would only describe DV using gender roles such as that. This is very unprofessional, and if I were a male, I would absolutely stay clear of her practice. 

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life. 

If you are a psychiatrist or a former client, or someone she testified against, I encourage you to sign this. I also encourage you reporting her as well. I believe between a lot of signatures and mass reporting her, through credible sources, we can make this happen.

In multiple scenarios, she would only describe DV using gender roles such as that. This is very unprofessional, and if I were a male, I would absolutely stay clear of her practice. 

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life. 

If you are a psychiatrist or a former client, or someone she testified against, I encourage you to sign this. I also encourage you reporting her as well. I believe between a lot of signatures and mass reporting her, through credible sources, we can make this happen.

May this high-profile court appearance expose the appalling Dr Hughes and her shocking lack of professionalism and immorality to the world.

column2: As a survivor of domestic violence both in a past relationship and surviving my own mother who abused my father and I since I was very young, I am absolutely appalled, distraught, and thoroughly traumatized by Dr Dawn Hughes’s gender bias in her testimony which was highly suspicious of a so called “expert witness”. I have lived in East Have CT next to New Haven and attended Yale University myself for my undergraduate degree, I am embarrassed by her arrogant obnoxious behaviors on stand and especially by her disgust with men and male hating agenda which was obvious to all. This behavior is unacceptable, there must be consequences.

First, as an "expert" witness, Dr. Dawn Hughes has shown nothing but clear biases towards men being abusers, and that women are always the victims. In multiple scenarios, she would only describe DV using gender roles such as that. This is very unprofessional, and if I were a male, I would absolutely stay clear of her practice. 

Besides her clear biases and purposeful use of wordage, she made accusations of a person she has never made an evaluation on. She, as a forensic psychologist, has not even shown evidence to support her wild accusations. She has not even done her job, in matters of defending Ms.Heard. She just spews things Amber Heard told her, with zero proof or evidence to back up said claims and accusations. 

In all, her blatant passive aggressiveness she has displayed in court, her clear biased opinions on DV gender roles, and lack of doing her job in providing evidence, is all very appalling to see. Given this, she does not deserve the privilege of being board certified, and I think her previous cases should be re examined as well. If she is acting this way in a live court case, I can only imagine how she would act in a private one. If someone like her is board certified, it makes me wonder what other quacks they will certify as well. 

Dr. Hughes does not deserve the privilege it is, to be a board certified psychologist, and she needs all previous cases of DV opened and reevaluated, based on her behavior displayed for all to see in the Johnny Depp vs Amber Heard trial. 

If we can get to 1 million signatures, then I would update the petition to revoke her license to practice all together. This way it totally eliminates the chances of her messing up another victims life. 

If you are a psychiatrist or a former client, or someone she testified against, I encourage you to sign this. I also encourage you reporting her as well. I believe between a lot of signatures and mass reporting her, through credible sources, we can make this happen.
